price: 89. Qofkii la yimaada wanaag25 wuxuu leeyahay wax ka khayr badan (oo waxaa lagu abaal marin Janno), argagaxa Maalinta (Qiyaamena) waa ka aamin.
arabic: مَن جَآءَ بِٱلۡحَسَنَةِ فَلَهُۥ خَيۡرٞ مِّنۡهَا وَهُم مِّن فَزَعٖ يَوۡمَئِذٍ ءَامِنُونَ
footnotes: 25. Halkan wanaagga waxaa loola jeedaa towxiidka iyo camal kastoo san.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: man jāa bil-ḥasanati falahu khayrun min'hā wahum min fazaʿin yawma-idhin āminūna
